mapper.select: select resume.*, result.count from resume left join (select *, count(*) count from (select c2.* from (select category.* from (select recruit.* from recruit inner join company on company.company_id=recruit.recruit_company_id where company_id=#{companyId}) r inner join category on r.recruit_id=category.category_recruit_id group by category_name) c1 join (SELECT * FROM category WHERE category_resume_id is not null) c2 on c1.category_name=c2.category_name) list group by category_resume_id order by count desc) result on resume.resume_id=result.category_resume_id;
select * from resume order by resume_created_at desc
select * from resume order by FIELD(resume_education, '고졸', '초대졸', '대졸'), resume_education ASC
select * from resume order by ( CASE WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(resume_career,1)) BETWEEN 48 AND 57 THEN 3 WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(resume_career,1)) < 123 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END ), binary(resume_career)
select sum(resume_read_count) resumeReadCount from resume where resume_user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume( resume_title, resume_education, resume_career, resume_photo, resume_link, resume_user_id, resume_read_count, resume_created_at ) VALUES( #{resumeTitle}, #{resumeEducation}, #{resumeCareer}, #{resumePhoto}, #{resumeLink}, #{resumeUserId},0, now() )
